trans-unit.source: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> and returns results as an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, using a callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: Starter asynkron kjøringen av Transact-SQL-setning eller lagret prosedyre som er beskrevet i dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> og returnerer resultatet som en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet, ved hjelp av en tilbakeringing-prosedyre.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that returns rows as XML, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>metoden starter prosessen for asynkront kjøring av en Transact-SQL-setningen eller lagret prosedyre som returnerer rader som XML, slik at andre oppgaver kan kjøres samtidig under kjøring av oppgaven.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the statement has completed, developers must call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method to finish the operation and retrieve the requested XML data.
trans-unit.target: Når uttrykket er fullført, utviklere må kalle den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>metode for å fullføre operasjonen, og den forespurte XML datahenting.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>metoden returnerer umiddelbart, men før koden utfører den tilsvarende <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>metodekall, må den ikke utføre andre kall som starter en synkron eller asynkron kjøring mot samme <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objektet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> before the command's execution is completed causes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to block until the execution is finished.
trans-unit.target: Kaller den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>før den Kommandoutførelsen fullstendige årsaker den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objektet til å blokkere til utførelse er fullført.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property ordinarily specifies a Transact-SQL statement with a valid FOR XML clause.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>egenskapen angir vanligvis en Transact-SQL-setning med en gyldig FOR XML-setningsdel.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, `CommandText` can also specify a statement that returns data that contains valid XML.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid `CommandText` kan også angi et uttrykk som returnerer dataene som inneholder gyldig XML.

trans-unit.source: This method can also be used to retrieve a single-row, single-column result set.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan også brukes til å hente et enkelt rader og én kolonne resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: In this case, if more than one row is returned, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method attaches the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to the value on the first row, and discards the rest of the result set.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet hvis mer enn én rad returneres av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>metoden tilordner den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>verdien på den første raden, og ignorerer resten av resultatet som er angitt.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: A typical BeginExecuteXmlReader query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` SqlCommand command = new SqlCommand("SELECT ContactID, FirstName, LastName FROM Contact FOR XML AUTO, XMLDATA", SqlConn); ``` This method can also be used to retrieve a single-row, single-column result set.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig BeginExecuteXmlReader-spørring kan formatere eksemplet nedenfor C#: ``` SqlCommand command = new SqlCommand("SELECT ContactID, FirstName, LastName FROM Contact FOR XML AUTO, XMLDATA", SqlConn); ``` denne metoden kan også brukes til å hente et enkelt rader og én kolonne resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: In this case, if more than one row is returned, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method attaches the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to the value on the first row, and discards the rest of the result set.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet hvis mer enn én rad returneres av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>metoden tilordner den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>verdien på den første raden, og ignorerer resten av resultatet som er angitt.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: The multiple active result set (MARS) feature lets multiple actions use the same connection.
trans-unit.target: Flere aktive resultatet sett (MARS) funksjonen lar flere handlinger bruker samme tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: The `callback` parameter lets you specify an <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that is called when the statement has completed.
trans-unit.target: Den `callback` parameter kan du angi en <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representanten kalles når uttrykket er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A> method from within this delegate procedure, or from any other location within your application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ringe det <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>metode fra denne representanten-prosedyre eller fra et annet sted i programmets.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can pass any object in the `stateObject` parameter, and your callback procedure can retrieve this information using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du sende et objekt i den `stateObject` parameteren og tilbakeringing prosedyren kan hente denne informasjonen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at Kommandotekst og parametere er sendt til serveren synkront.

trans-unit.source: If a large command or many parameters is sent, this method may block during writes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en stor kommando eller mange parametre sendes, kan denne metoden blokkere under skriver.

trans-unit.source: After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: Når kommandoen sendes, returneres umiddelbart uten å vente på et svar fra serveren--det vil si er leseoperasjoner asynkront.

trans-unit.source: All errors that occur during the execution of the operation are thrown as exceptions in the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: Alle feil som oppstår under utførelse av operasjonen er registrert som unntak i tilbakeringing prosedyren.

trans-unit.source: You must handle the exception in the callback procedure, not in the main application.
trans-unit.target: Du må unntaket i prosedyren tilbakeringing, ikke i den primære applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: See the example in this topic for additional information on handling exceptions in the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: Se eksemplet i dette emnet for mer informasjon om behandling av unntak i tilbakeringing prosedyren.

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>for å få tilgang til XML-data, SQL Server vil returnere noen XML-resultater større enn 2,033 tegn lang i flere rader 2,033 tegn.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå dette ved å bruke <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>til å lese FOR XML-spørringer.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se artikkel Q310378, "PRB: XML Data er avkortet når du Bruk SqlDataReader," i Microsoft Knowledge Base på http://support.microsoft.com.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that is invoked when the command's execution has completed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representanten aktiveres når det Kommandoutførelsen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: Pass <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Microsoft Visual Basic) to indicate that no callback is required.
trans-unit.target: Sende <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Microsoft Visual Basic) til å angi at ingen tilbakeringing kreves.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined state object that is passed to the callback procedure.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte tilstand-objekt som er sendt til tilbakeringing-prosedyre.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve this object from within the callback procedure using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hente dette objektet fra i tilbakeringing-prosedyren ved hjelp av den <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState*>egenskapen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that can be used to poll, wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader*> is called, which returns the results of the command as XML.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som kan brukes til å registrere deg, venter du resultatene eller begge deler, denne verdien er også nødvendig når den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader*>kalles, som returnerer resultatet av kommandoen som XML.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.EndExecuteXmlReader*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Tries to cancel the execution of a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Prøver å avbryte kjøringen av en <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If there is nothing to cancel, nothing occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingenting å avbryte, oppstår det ingenting.

trans-unit.source: However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det pågår en kommando, og forsøk på å avbryte mislykkes, genereres imidlertid ingen unntak.

trans-unit.source: In some, rare, cases, if you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> then call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Close%2A> (implicitily or explicitly) before calling Cancel, and then call Cancel, the cancel command will not be sent to SQL Server and the result set can continue to stream after you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I noen, sjelden, tilfeller Hvis du kaller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>kaller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Close%2A>(implicitily eller eksplisitt) før du kaller Avbryt og kaller Avbryt, kommandoen Avbryt vil ikke bli sendt til SQL Server og resultatsettet kan fortsette å flyten når du kaller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Close%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this, make sure that you call Cancel before closing the reader or connection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå dette ved Sørg for at du ringer Avbryt før du lukker leseren eller tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objekt som er en kopi av den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objekt som er en kopi av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column encryption setting for this command.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innstillingen for kryptering for denne kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The column encryption setting for this command.
trans-unit.target: Krypteringsinnstillingen for denne kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Transact-SQL statement, table name or stored procedure to execute at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den Transact-SQL-setningen, tabellnavn eller lagret prosedyre til å kjøre i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the CommandText property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>er satt til `StoredProcedure`, CommandText-egenskapen må være satt til navnet på den lagrede prosedyren.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan være nødvendig å bruke tegnet avbrytningssyntaks Hvis det lagrede prosedyrenavnet inneholder noen spesialtegn.

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the `Execute` methods.
trans-unit.target: Utfører denne lagrede prosedyren når du kaller en av de `Execute` metoder.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to a Transact-SQL statement or a stored procedure called by a command of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft .NET Framework-dataleverandør for SQL Server støtter ikke spørsmål merke (?)-plassholder for sending av parameterne til en Transact-SQL-setning eller en lagret prosedyre kalles av en kommando for `CommandType.Text`.

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må parametere med navn brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM dbo.Customers WHERE CustomerID = @CustomerID ``` For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: ``` SELECT * FROM dbo.Customers WHERE CustomerID = @CustomerID ``` For mer informasjon, kan du se [parameteren datatypene og konfigurere parametere](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
trans-unit.target: Transact-SQL-setning eller lagret prosedyre til å kjøre.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ventetiden før forsøket å utføre en kommando og det genereres en feil.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates no limit (an attempt to execute a command will wait indefinitely).
trans-unit.target: Verdien 0 indikerer ingen grense (et forsøk på å utføre en kommando skal vente på ubestemt tid).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The CommandTimeout property will be ignored during asynchronous method calls such as <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For CommandTimeout egenskapen blir ignorert under asynkrone metodekall for eksempel <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: CommandTimeout has no effect when the command is executed against a context connection (a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> opened with "context connection=true" in the connection string).
trans-unit.target: CommandTimeout har ingen virkning når kommandoen kjøres mot en context-tilkobling (en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>åpnes med "konteksttilkoblingen = true" i tilkoblingsstrengen).</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is the cumulative time-out (for all network packets that are read during the invocation of a method) for all network reads during command execution or processing of the results.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen er kumulativ tidsavbrudd (for alle nettverkstilkoblinger pakker som leses under aktivering av metoden) for å få alle leseoperasjoner under kjøring av kommando eller behandling av resultatene.

trans-unit.source: A time-out can still occur after the first row is returned, and does not include user processing time, only network read time.
trans-unit.target: Et tidsavbrudd fortsatt kan forekomme når den første raden, returneres og ikke inkluderer brukeren behandlingstid bare nettverk lese tid.

trans-unit.source: > > For example, with a 30 second time out, if <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> requires two network packets, then it has 30 seconds to read both network packets.
trans-unit.target: >> For eksempel med 30 sekund tid ut om <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>krever to nettverkstilkoblingen pakker, må den har 30 sekunder å lese begge nettverkstilkoblingen pakker.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> again, it will have another 30 seconds to read any data that it requires.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>på nytt, den har en annen 30 sekunder å lese data som den krever.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.
trans-unit.target: Tid i sekunder å vente på kommandoen som skal kjøres.

trans-unit.source: The default is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 30 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText*> property is to be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText*>egenskapen er tolkes.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText*>

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.

trans-unit.source: For example: SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = @CustomerID For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A>egenskapen er null, og transaksjonen allerede er iverksatt eller rullet tilbake, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A>er satt til null.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finishes asynchronous execution of a Transact-SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: Avsluttes asynkron kjøring av en Transact-SQL-setning.

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> to execute a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/add/includes/tsql-md.md)] statement, you must call EndExecuteNonQuery in order to complete the operation.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>til å utføre en [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/add/includes/tsql-md.md)] -setningen, må du kaller EndExecuteNonQuery for å fullføre operasjonen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the process of executing the command has not yet finished, this method blocks until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Hvis prosessen for utførelse av kommandoen ikke har ennå er fullført, som denne metoden før operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Users can verify that the command has completed its operation by using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> instance returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Brukere kan kontrollere at kommandoen er fullført operasjonen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>forekomsten ble returnert av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: If a callback procedure was specified in the call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>, this method must be called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tilbakeringing prosedyren ble angitt i kallet til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>, denne metoden må kalles.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by the call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>Returnert av kallet til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery*>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected (the same behavior as <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery*>).
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt (på samme måte som <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery*>).</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery*>

trans-unit.source: asyncResult parameter is null ( in Microsoft Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: asyncResultparameteren er null ( i Microsoft Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: EndExecuteNonQuery was called more than once for a single command execution, or the method was mismatched against its execution method (for example, the code called EndExecuteNonQuery to complete execution of a call to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader*>.
trans-unit.target: EndExecuteNonQuery ble kalt mer enn én gang for en enkelt Kommandoutførelsen eller metoden ble ikke samsvarer mot den kjøring-metoden (for eksempel koden kalles EndExecuteNonQuery for å fullføre kjøring av et kall til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader*>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader*>

trans-unit.source: The amount of time specified in <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout*> elapsed and the asynchronous operation specified with <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery*> is not complete.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid som er angitt i <> </> *> utløpt, og den asynkrone operasjonen som er angitt med <> </> *> er ikke fullført.

trans-unit.source: In some situations, <xref:System.IAsyncResult> can be set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsCompleted" name="IsCompleted" href=""></xref> incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: I enkelte situasjoner <xref:System.IAsyncResult>kan bare settes til <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsCompleted" name="IsCompleted" href=""> </xref> feil.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: If this occurs and EndExecuteNonQuery is called, EndExecuteNonQuery could raise a SqlException error if the amount of time specified in <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout*> elapsed and the asynchronous operation specified with <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery*> is not complete.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette skjer og EndExecuteNonQuery kalles EndExecuteNonQuery kan øke feilmeldingen SqlException Hvis hvor lang tid angitt i <> </> *> utløpt, og den asynkrone operasjonen som er angitt med <> </> *> er ikke fullført.

trans-unit.source: To correct this situation, you should either increase the value of CommandTimeout or reduce the work being done by the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: For å rette opp dette, bør du øker verdien for CommandTimeout eller redusere arbeidet som den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Finishes asynchronous execution of a Transact-SQL statement, returning the requested <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Avsluttes asynkron kjøring av en Transact-SQL-setning, returnerer den forespurte <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to execute a Transact-SQL statement, you must call EndExecuteReader in order to complete the operation.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>for å utføre en Transact-SQL-setning, må du kaller EndExecuteReader for å fullføre operasjonen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the process of executing the command has not yet finished, this method blocks until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Hvis prosessen for utførelse av kommandoen ikke har ennå er fullført, som denne metoden før operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Users can verify that the command has completed its operation by using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> instance returned by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Brukere kan kontrollere at kommandoen er fullført operasjonen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>forekomsten ble returnert av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.target: Hvis en tilbakeringing prosedyren ble angitt i kallet til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>, denne metoden må kalles.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>Returnert av kallet til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader*>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Executes a Transact-SQL statement against the connection and returns the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en Transact-SQL-setning mot tilkoblingen, og returnerer antall berørt av rader.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ExecuteNonQuery to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables), or to change the data in a database without using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke ExecuteNonQuery til å utføre operasjoner, katalogen (for eksempel spørring strukturen i en database eller oppretting av databaseobjekter som tabeller), eller endre data i en database uten å bruke en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>ved å utføre oppdatering, INNSETTING eller DELETE-setninger.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Although the ExecuteNonQuery returns no rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data.
trans-unit.target: Selv om ExecuteNonQuery returnerer ingen rader, noen utdataparametere eller returverdier som er tilordnet til parametere er fylt ut med data.

trans-unit.source: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.
trans-unit.target: For UPDATE-, INSERT- og DELETE-setninger er returverdien hvor mange rader som er berørt av kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: When a trigger exists on a table being inserted or updated, the return value includes the number of rows affected by both the insert or update operation and the number of rows affected by the trigger or triggers.
trans-unit.target: Når det finnes en utløser i en tabell som er satt inn eller oppdatert, inneholder returverdien hvor mange rader som er berørt av både innsettingen eller oppdateringen operasjonen og hvor mange rader som er berørt av utløser eller utløsere.

trans-unit.source: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

trans-unit.source: Sends the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText*> to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection*> and builds a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sender den <> </> *> til den <> </> *> og bygger en <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>er satt til `StoredProcedure`, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>egenskapen må være satt til navnet på den lagrede prosedyren.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call ExecuteReader.
trans-unit.target: Utfører denne lagrede prosedyren når du kaller ExecuteReader.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a transaction is deadlocked, an exception may not be thrown until <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis en transaksjon er gått i vranglås, kan ikke bli utløst et unntak før <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>kalles.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: The multiple active result set (MARS) feature allows for multiple actions using the same connection.
trans-unit.target: Funksjonen med angitt (MARS) flere aktive resultatet tillater flere handlinger ved hjelp av samme tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: If you use ExecuteReader or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker ExecuteReader eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>for å få tilgang til XML-data, SQL Server vil returnere noen XML-resultater større enn 2,033 tegn lang i flere rader 2,033 tegn.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå dette ved å bruke <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>til å lese FOR XML-spørringer.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se artikkel Q310378, "PRB: XML Data er avkortet når du Bruk SqlDataReader," i Microsoft Knowledge Base på http://support.microsoft.com.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.

trans-unit.source: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: Kjører spørringen, og returnerer den første kolonnen i den første raden i resultatsettet som returneres av spørringen.

trans-unit.source: Additional columns or rows are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Flere kolonner eller rader ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: Use the ExecuteScalar method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ExecuteScalar-metoden til å hente en enkelt verdi (for eksempel en aggregatfunksjon verdi) fra en database.

trans-unit.source: This requires less code than using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> method, and then performing the operations that you need to generate the single value using the data returned by a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: Dette krever mindre kode enn ved hjelp av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>metoden, og deretter utføre operasjoner som du må generere enkeltverdi med dataene som ble returnert av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: A typical ExecuteScalar query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` cmd.CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dbo.region"; Int32 count = (Int32) cmd.ExecuteScalar(); ```
trans-unit.target: En vanlig ExecuteScalar-spørring kan formatere eksemplet nedenfor C#:``` cmd.CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dbo.region"; Int32 count = (Int32) cmd.ExecuteScalar(); ```

trans-unit.source: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the result set is empty.
trans-unit.target: Den første kolonnen i den første raden i resultatsettet eller en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic) Hvis resultatsettet er tom.

trans-unit.source: Returns a maximum of 2033 characters.

trans-unit.source: Sends the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText*> to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection*> and builds an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Sender den <> </> *> til den <> </> *> og bygger en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> property ordinarily specifies a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/add/includes/tsql-md.md)] statement with a valid FOR XML clause.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>egenskapen angir vanligvis et [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/add/includes/tsql-md.md)] setning med en gyldig FOR XML-setningsdel.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A> can also specify a statement that returns `ntext` or `nvarchar` data that contains valid XML, or the contents of a column defined with the `xml` data type.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>kan også angi et uttrykk som returnerer `ntext` eller `nvarchar` data som inneholder gyldig XML eller innholdet i en kolonne som er definert med den `xml` datatype.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A typical ExecuteXmlReader query can be formatted as in the following Microsoft Visual C# example: ``` SqlCommand command = new SqlCommand("SELECT * FROM dbo.Customers FOR XML AUTO, XMLDATA", SqlConn); ``` This method can also be used to retrieve a single-row, single-column result set that contains XML data.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig ExecuteXmlReader-spørring kan formatere eksemplet nedenfor Microsoft Visual C#: ``` SqlCommand command = new SqlCommand("SELECT * FROM dbo.Customers FOR XML AUTO, XMLDATA", SqlConn); ``` denne metoden kan også brukes til å hente et enkelt rader og én kolonne resultatsett som inneholder XML-data.

trans-unit.source: In this case, if more than one row is returned, the ExecuteXmlReader method attaches the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to the value on the first row, and discards the rest of the result set.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet hvis mer enn én rad returneres, metoden ExecuteXmlReader knytter det <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>verdien på den første raden, og ignorerer resten av resultatet som er angitt.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The multiple active result set (MARS) feature allows for multiple actions using the same connection.
trans-unit.target: Funksjonen med angitt (MARS) flere aktive resultatet tillater flere handlinger ved hjelp av samme tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A>for å få tilgang til XML-data, SQL Server vil returnere noen XML-resultater større enn 2,033 tegn lang i flere rader 2,033 tegn.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReader%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, use ExecuteXmlReader or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A> to read FOR XML queries.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå dette ved å bruke ExecuteXmlReader eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>til å lese FOR XML-spørringer.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se artikkel Q310378, "PRB: XML Data er avkortet når du Bruk SqlDataReader," i Microsoft Knowledge Base på http://support.microsoft.com.

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object bound to this command.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir den <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> objektet bundet til denne kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: You must set the value for this property before the command is executed for it to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi verdien for denne egenskapen før kommandoen utføres for at den skal tre i kraft.

trans-unit.source: When set to null (default), no notification should be requested.
trans-unit.target: Når satt til null (standard), ingen varsling skal bli bedt om.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application should automatically receive query notifications from a common <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om programmet automatisk skal motta spørringsvarsler fra et felles <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This feature is used in ASP.NET applications to receive notifications for all commands executed in an ASP page against SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonen brukes til å motta varsler for alle kommandoer som utføres i en ASP-side mot SQL Server i ASP.NET-applikasjoner.

trans-unit.source: This enables ASP.NET to cache the page until the queries used to render the page would produce a different result.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for ASP.NET å hurtigbufre siden før de brukes til å gjengi siden vil spørringene et annet resultat.

trans-unit.source: Automatic enlistment.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk oppføring.

trans-unit.source: This property applies only to versions of SQL Server that support query notifications.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare for versjonene av SQL Server som støtter spørringsvarsler.

trans-unit.source: For earlier versions, setting this property to **true** has no effect on the application.
trans-unit.target: For tidligere versjoner når egenskapen settes **true** har ingen innvirkning på programmet.

trans-unit.source: **true** if the application should automatically receive query notifications; otherwise **false**.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** Hvis programmet automatisk skal motta spørringsvarsler; ellers **false**.

trans-unit.source: The default value is **true**.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er **true**.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to a SQL Statement or a stored procedure called by a command of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft .NET Framework-dataleverandør for SQL Server støtter ikke spørsmål merke (?)-plassholder for sending av parameterne til en SQL-setning eller en lagret prosedyre kalles av en kommando for `CommandType.Text`.

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må parametere med navn brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example: SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = @CustomerID > [!NOTE] > If the parameters in the collection do not match the requirements of the query to be executed, an error may result.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: Velg * fra kunder WHERE CustomerID = @CustomerID > [!NOTE] > Hvis parameterne i samlingen ikke samsvarer med kravene for spørringen kjøres, kan det føre en feil.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [parameteren datatypene og konfigurere parametere](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The parameters of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: Parameterne for Transact-SQL-setning eller lagret prosedyre.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Creates a prepared version of the command on an instance of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en klargjort versjon av kommandoen til en forekomst av SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A> is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to Prepare should succeed, although it may cause a no-op.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>er satt til `StoredProcedure`, kallet til Prepare skal lykkes, selv om det kan føre til at ingen-drift</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before you call Prepare, specify the data type of each parameter in the statement to be prepared.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller Prepare, må du angi datatypen for hver parameter i å være forberedt-setningen.

trans-unit.source: For each parameter that has a variable length data type, you must set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A> property to the maximum size needed.
trans-unit.target: For hver parameter som har datatypen variabel lengde, må du angi den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>egenskapen til den maksimale størrelsen som er nødvendig.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Prepare returns an error if these conditions are not met.
trans-unit.target: Klargjør returnerer en feil hvis disse vilkårene ikke er oppfylt.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the database context is changed by executing the Transact-SQL `USE <database>` statement, or by calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A> method, then Prepare must be called a second time.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis databasekonteksten endres ved å kjøre Transact-SQL `USE <database>` setningen eller ved å ringe det <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>metoden og Prepare må kalles én gang.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call an `Execute` method after calling Prepare, any parameter value that is larger than the value specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A> property is automatically truncated to the original specified size of the parameter, and no truncation errors are returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller en `Execute` metoden når du kaller Prepare, en parameterverdi som er større enn verdien som er angitt av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>egenskapen avkortes automatisk til den opprinnelige størrelsen som er angitt for parameteren, og ingen avkutting feil returneres.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Output parameters (whether prepared or not) must have a user-specified data type.
trans-unit.target: Sender parameterne (om forberedt eller ikke) må ha en brukerdefinert datatype.

trans-unit.source: If you specify a variable length data type, you must also specify the maximum <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en variabel lengdedatatype, må du også angi maksimalt <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Prior to Visual Studio 2010, Prepare threw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Før Visual Studio 2010 forårsaket Prepare et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Visual Studio 2010, this method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Starter i Visual Studio 2010, denne metoden ikke Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout*>egenskapen til standardverdien.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>er 30 sekunder.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the execution of a Transact-SQL statement completes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kjøringen av en Transact-SQL-setningen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objekt som er en kopi av den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objekt som er en kopi av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction"></xref> within which the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction"> </xref> som den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> utfører.

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the Transaction property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi egenskapen Transaction hvis den allerede er satt til en bestemt verdi, og kommandoen er i ferd med å kjøres.

trans-unit.source: If you set the transaction property to a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction> object that is not connected to the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> as the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object, an exception is thrown the next time that you attempt to execute a statement.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter transaction-egenskapen til en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>objekt som ikke er koblet til samme <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>som den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objekt, et unntak neste gang du forsøker å utføre en setning.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how command results are applied to the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> when used by the **Update** method of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvordan kommandoen brukes av <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> ved bruk av den **oppdateringen** metoden for den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource> value is **Both** unless the command is automatically generated (as in the case of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>), in which case the default is **None**.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource>verdien er **begge** Hvis kommandoen genereres automatisk (som med den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>), og da standarden er **ingen**.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the **UpdatedRowSource** property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker den **UpdatedRowSource** egenskapen se [DataAdapter parametere](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"> </xref> verdier.
